name: Coco Banana
overview: Pretty nice platform game, even if it is hard to understand why we have a Crocodile on the cover while in game you clearly drive a Dragon. Beyond this factor, we have 5 worlds with related passwords and a drastically more difficult level 4 than the others.Coco Banana is a new Amiga platformer by Amiten Software (Johnny Acevedo & Team). Currently the game is expected to have around 30 levels, classic Amiga parallax scrolling and the game features a very cute looking crocodile character.
